website_summaries.verdict: Outdoor enthusiasts who want to tackle trails with sufficient arch support and comfort may do so with the KEEN Venice II H2. Those who also value surface traction, durability, and lightness may find these qualities in this sandal.However, they didn’t like the heel strap for not staying in place during the whole trip. Taking all of these things into account, the Venice II H2 from Keen can still deliver results to female adventurers with its set of strengths.
pros: Numerous owners were astonished by the KEEN Venice II H2’s arch support
The majority appreciated the comfort granted by this closed-toe sandal for hiking adventures
Its lightness won the approval of many female hikers
The footgear’s durability was applauded by a bunch of users
A handful of consumers were impressed with its roomy toe box
The outsole of this KEEN product gripped well on challenging surfaces
It virtually had no break-in period, as testified by the minority
cons: Several purchasers said that the Venice II H2’s heel strap kept folding in on itself when used outdoors

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, hardwearing sandal
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Keen sandals, second in this style. Fit is great, comfortable from the get-go, no blisters on first wearing in bare feet. I walk regularly over rugged ground, cliff paths, gorse moors, woodlands and beaches and these things tolerate all of that. They wear well, my other pair are a few years old and still feel great. I love the toe protector, especially useful for rugged ground.
customer_reviews.author: C4cat

customer_reviews.title: Service second to none
customer_reviews.text: Bought the sanders and when ordered was told that I should have ordered a half size bigger as they was small fitting,not the case I ordered 5.5 and they are a perfect fit very comfy and extremely very good price excellent quality and will definitely buy again came very quickly so all round excellent product excellent service thank you
customer_reviews.author: C Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good rugged walking sandals
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy with a good thick sole, I have only worn around the house for a couple of hours so far.
customer_reviews.author: Babsi

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Get a pair most years as I walk miles every day in them.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery and item good quality. A wide fit .
customer_reviews.text: They will do the job but will need breaking in first with socks on.
customer_reviews.author: wendy dayment

customer_reviews.title: Love these.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Chunky sole, practical. Comfortable. Great for dog walking. Adjustable to fit. Great looks.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Keen Sandals
customer_reviews.text: Keen Venice H2 Sandals This sandal is very comfortable and practical. The toe being protected is very useful and the sandal is still very airy. One suggestion would be the introduction of half sizes - my feet differ in size slightly and I think the option of extra sizes would widen appeal. Overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in my regular size 6 but too tight on toe. Size 6.5 much more expensive so I exchanged for a different style in 6.5. Which were fine but I preferred the colour and style of this sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Michaelle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm used to Keens being on the large and chunky side these are a very close fit
customer_reviews.author: Janet Sykes

customer_reviews.title: Real cool to wear
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait for the summer so I can wear these for all the outdoor pursuits. Real cool to wear
customer_reviews.author: very satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Good wide fitting and great for walking in summer
customer_reviews.text: Good wide fitting and great for walking in summer. Great for walking on beach and doesn't matter if they get wet. Feet stay cool.
customer_reviews.author: sally busby

customer_reviews.title: So glad I was able to purchase these in a half ...
customer_reviews.text: So glad I was able to purchase these in a half size as most shops only offer full sizes and very limited colours
customer_reviews.author: JKT

product_meta.title: KEEN Venice II H2 Women's Walking Sandals - 4 Grey
product_meta.description: Keen Venice II H2 Women's Walking Sandals Versatile and comfortable, these sandals feature an adjustable heel strap and lace-capture system for a custom, secure fit every time. Polyester Webbing Upper Constructed using a quick-drying polyester webbing, the Venice II H2 Women's Walking Sandals ensure durable comfort. The webbed upper is quick drying and comfortable, and also washable making this versatile sandal a must-have for your walking wardrobe. A breathable quick dry lining helps to ensure a constant supply of fresh, cool air that works to cool at all times. Sweat and moisture build-up can be wicked away as it as it's produced then transferred to the outer layers to be easily evaporated. The lace-lock bungee system ensures a secure and stable fit for the foot, it can be easily and quickly adjusted whilst on the go. Lastly, a molded rubber guard protects the toe from loose debris and rocks. EVA Midsole An EVA midsole provides significant cushioning and comfort to help improve the level of your performance so you can stay at your optimum level, for longer. Holding excellent cushioning abilities, the midsole absorbs shocks as you move throughout the gait cycle providing resilient cushioning and reducing the risks of potential injury. The EVA footbed provides yields superb cushioning properties allowing you to walk further for longer. An integrated arch support provides all-day-long comfort and ensures long-lasting stability whilst a metatarsal ridge provides a natural fit. Completing the midsole is cleansport NXT which ensures your feet remain protected every walk, but so do your shoes; the cleansport NXT natural odour control means that the inside of the shoe remains as durable as the outside. The combination of durability, comfort, and support creates a shoe that allows for optimum performance ensuring you last even longer, even in the snow. Non Marking Rubber Outsole A non-marking rubber outsole provides an abundance of grip and traction on a varie
feature_bullets: Washable Polyester Webbing Upper - Secure upper with optimal ventilation.
Breathable Lining - Keeps you cool by ensuring breathability.
Lace-Lock Bungee System - Secures the midfoot.
Toe Guard - Protects the feet from loose debris.
EVA Midsole - Increases comfort and durability.
